title: You missed one thing with Pizza delivery Sivir and Chicken Galio
body:
Flying Spaghetti Monster Aurelian Sol..

Imagine with flying little meatballs orbiting him and a pasta dish for his stun. And with his ultimate being 'mom's spagetti' when he vomits all over your sweater.

replies.body: Are you forgetting the original spaghetti monster, vel'koz?
Original spaghetti monster is Rito's code

Brutal...  I approve~
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

I thought the **God-of-Spaghetti-code** was Mordekaiser...
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Th2Fr8jtDQw
Spaghetti Vel'Koz, too
As much as Sol needs a new skin, The Flying Spaghetti Monster skin rightfully belongs to Vel'Koz.
And ASol could just get Pizza Delivery, since it would be basically the same thing as what OP suggests, just Pizza as Q and meatballs as Passive.
The skins were based on shitty delivery food servers, not just straight food skins.
Riot aint gonna do it still though cause they hate giving Sol skins {{item:3070}} {{champion:136}} {{item:3070}}

Sol IS getting a skin this year. It's been confirmed.

http://comicbook.com/gaming/2018/03/06/league-of-legends-skins-aurelion-sol-shen-amumu-galio/
I'd bet most of my money that it'll be at the end of the year AND it'll be a rushed skin with little/no effort put in
No I actually think it is because they don't want Sol's first skin after release to be a joke skin.
Riot wouldn't give it to sol if it was his 3rd skin, let alone having more than just a release skin
Riot literally said he has a skin in the works. You don't know what your talking about.
Riot's gonna be a while with that skin for Sol, I would bet money that it'll appear next to the end of the year(if not longer) and be low quality
No religious symbols duh

How the hell could you give this
https://www-kiva-org-1.global.ssl.fastly.net/img/w800/196261.jpg
to {{champion:136}} instead of {{champion:161}} ??

Well first of all, Vel'Koz can't fly like Aurelion Sol does. Yeah he hovers, but he hasn't got an actual flying skill, which makes it more fun for it to be Aurelion Sol, but whatever Vel'Koz is fine too, I just want a flying spaghetti monster.

http://www.lolking.net/models?champion=161&skin=0

Animation "run haste"
Upvoted for Eminem.

We need Ice Cream Man Ekko. Q is a sundae that blows up and spread aparts, W is a freezing sphere, E causes sprinkles to show up, and ultimate should play a ice cream truck theme. Give him a uniform and makes his weapon a popsicle and we're set.

Look, if you had mom's spaghetti,

Would you capture it or just let it slip?

Yo
Riot making an Aurelion Sol skin LUL

Riot has actually confirmed that there IS an Aurelion Sol skin in the works. 

http://comicbook.com/gaming/2018/03/06/league-of-legends-skins-aurelion-sol-shen-amumu-galio/
Still gonna take next to a year for Riot to put it out(and it probably won't even be good quality)
no i dont want to wait 2 years just for riot to release a joke skin for sol, i want a serious themed skin.
They forgot to do VO imo.
That's a Vel'Koz skin >.>
This may be seen as a little too political, but under another name possibly.
this.. is actually a really good idea
OMG this is actually a brillant idea ! Take my upvote ^^
